ygData.messageBody:
Actually what I heard was that Verant decided to change an Everquest myth
into a reality because they were certain it would never be realized that was
what had happened. They supposedly, according to a former GM, changed the
amount of xp needed to get the last bubble. They added about 5 deaths worth
of xp to the last bubble at each level for the various classes.

Kitasi
